thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: AlexisT

author: AlexisT
title: AlexisT
text:
I have been ordering products from Banggood since early 2016. In that time, i have placed 70 orders for products ranging from consumer electronics, to diy, but mostly RC products. They have a huge range of products including replacement parts which is key in the RC hobby, at very competitive prices.
Recently, i've had two of my orders missing probably due to the Christmas period or the Chinese New Year; but their customer service is very responsive and they resent my orders in a short period of time (China Post was to blame).
Excellent service, and a reliable company!
